name: Deborah Ann NARDELLA, Petitioner v. SOUTHEASTERN PENNSYLVANIA TRANSIT AUTHORITY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Nardella v. Southeastern Pennsylvania Transit Authority

parties: Deborah Ann NARDELLA, Petitioner v. SOUTHEASTERN PENNSYLVANIA TRANSIT AUTHORITY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of June, 2012, the Petition for Leave to File a Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tunc is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
46 A.3d 708
Deborah Ann NARDELLA, Petitioner v. SOUTHEASTERN PENNSYLVANIA TRANSIT AUTHORITY, Respondent.
No. 35 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 13, 2012.
